author: Chris Sawin, Maxwell Strachan
title: Angry Customers and Empty Shelves: My Life at Kroger During Coronavirus
description: To put it lightly, the last few weeks of work have been surreal and exhausting.
content: Working at a grocery store when most businesses have closed or resorted to working from home is sort of surreal. Id love to stay locked inside for a few weeks just to catch up on rest, movies and TV shows, and household tasks. But Ive worked in retail so long… [+9417 chars]
